trait.name: Hit Points
text: 4 + four times your ranger level (the beast has a number of Hit Dice [d6s] equal to your ranger level)

trait.name: Flyby
text: The beast doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Primal Bond
text: You can add your proficiency bonus to any ability check or saving throw that the beast makes.

action.name: Shred
text: Melee Weapon Attack: {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 1d4 + 3 + PB slashing damage
